thread.title: Michigan punter gets kicked in the pants by furious fans on Twitter
thread.title_full: Michigan punter gets kicked in the pants by furious fans on Twitter

title: Michigan punter gets kicked in the pants by furious fans on Twitter
text:
— Michigan's Punter (@michiganpunter) October 17, 2015 "Well we're definitely not drafting the Michigan punter now." - Jaguars front office — Faux John Madden (@FauxJohnMadden) October 17, 2015 Michigan's punter decides to relax on the hammock after a rough day pic.twitter.com/jiPwiBgrLr — Michael David Smith (@MichaelDavSmith) October 17, 2015 
At least there were some cooler heads who felt bad for the guy, including a former Michigan punter. true If you are harassing the Michigan punter, be aware it says a lot more about you than it does him. He gave his best, while you are a lowlife. — Mike Greenberg (@Espngreeny) October 18, 2015 Well that's a bummer for the Michigan punter. I'm sure people are reacting totally rationally online right now. — Chris Kluwe (@ChrisWarcraft) October 18, 2015 MSU loves bullying punters... I feel you @michiganpunter — Baylor's Kicker (@BaylorsKicker) October 17, 2015 I'm still sick to my stomach for that punter...Blake O'Neill wasn't trying to fail...hoping people have a bit of compassion for him — Joel Klatt (@joelklatt) October 17, 2015 Hate tweets sent to Blake O'Neill are a disgrace. Ignore them Blake! @blakewoneill True M fans know you are a star. Mistakes happen. @GoBlue — Gene Sperling (@genebsperling) October 18, 2015 For all u #UMich "fans" who despise Blake O'Neill right now, just remember he can also do this! https://t.co/LUyzcWJY2d
